About
=====

* The Carbon Emission Task (CET) as a new paradigm grounded in
  experimental economics to assess actual pro-environmental behavior

* The CET can be used in laboratory, online, or classroom studies.

* Participants face repeated tradeoffs between financial bonus
  opportunities paired with real carbon emissions and foregoing such
  opportunities while staying carbon-neutral.
